content.raw:
If I remember well, on GzWeb we are only checking updates for the values currently expanded to minimize the traffic. 

And if I'm not mistaken, we're only updating values available already in rendering (like poses), so we don't have to send requests to the server every time. gzclient sends a request to the server when an entity is selected, that's why it flickers.
content.html:
If I remember well, on GzWeb we are only checking updates for the values currently expanded to minimize the traffic.

And if I'm not mistaken, we're only updating values available already in rendering (like poses), so we don't have to send requests to the server every time. gzclient sends a request to the server when an entity is selected, that's why it flickers.
